title: Core dump after torch.permute with negative index
body_html:
I got core dump which killed my script / jupyter kernel (traceback). I used pytorch master (commit e9f144)

After investigating, I can reproduce its behavior with the following simple script:

import torch

u = torch.zeros((3, 3), requires_grad=True)
v = u.permute(-1, -2)  # (1, 0) here is fine
v.sum().backward()

After knowing the reason, I can fix my script by using non-negative indices. If this behavior is expected, I will close this issue. :)

cc @apaszke
